executive.title: The Executive Summary
executive.description: Perfect for C-level reporting and board presentations. Focuses on high-level KPIs like ROAS, total spend, and conversion value. Ideal for CMOs, CFOs, and entrepreneurs who want the big picture without drowning in technical details.

tip1.title: Segment by Device (Mobile vs Desktop)
tip1.description: Mobile conversion rates are often 2-3x lower than desktop. Analyze your performance by device and adjust your bids accordingly. On Flipika, add a 'Device' filter to compare instantly.

tip2.title: Track Weekly Trends, Not Just Monthly
tip2.description: A good Google Ads & Meta Ads report shows day-by-day patterns. Monday vs. Sunday, week 1 vs. week 4 of the month. Monthly averages often hide critical insights. Use Flipika's time-series charts to detect variations.

tip3.title: Compare Current Period vs. Previous Period
tip3.description: "This month vs. last month" or "This week vs. last week". Time comparisons reveal trends you don't see with absolute numbers. Flipika automatically calculates % changes for each KPI.

tip4.title: Highlight ROAS or CPA, Not Clicks
tip4.description: Clicks and impressions are vanity metrics. What matters: how much it costs to acquire a customer (CPA) or how much it returns (ROAS). Your clients don't care about clicks, they want business results.

tip5.title: Always Include Search Lost IS (Budget)
tip5.description: This metric shows the % of impressions lost due to insufficient budget. If it's >20%, you're leaving money on the table. Recommend a budget increase to your clients with precise data.

tip6.title: Set Up Anomaly Alerts
tip6.description: CPA doubling overnight? CTR collapsing? Configure automatic alerts to be notified immediately. Flipika sends you an email if a metric deviates +/- 30% from its 7-day average.

tip7.title: Export to PDF for Board Presentations
tip7.description: Even though live dashboards are great, some clients prefer PDF for archives or presentations. Flipika generates pixel-perfect PDFs in one click, with your branding and generation date.

faq.q1: Is this Google Ads & Meta Ads report template really free?
faq.a1: Yes, you can use our standard templates for free, forever. We also offer premium features (white-label custom domain, unlimited PDF reports, priority support) for agencies managing multiple clients, but the core templates remain 100% free with no time limits.
faq.q2: Can I export the report to PDF?
faq.a2: Absolutely. While we encourage live sharing to benefit from interactivity and real-time data, you can generate a pixel-perfect PDF report in one click. The PDF includes all your charts, tables, and branding. Perfect for client presentations or archives.
faq.q3: How does Flipika connect to my Google Ads account?
faq.a3: We use the official Google Ads API with OAuth 2.0. It's the same security protocol as Gmail or Google Drive. The connection is read-only: we NEVER modify your campaigns, budgets, or bids. We just visualize performance. You can revoke access anytime from your Google account.
faq.q4: Is it better than Looker Studio?
faq.a4: Looker Studio is powerful but slow (10-15s loading time) and hard to maintain (connectors that disconnect). Flipika is built for speed (< 1s loading) and premium aesthetics. If you want client-ready reports without technical headaches, Flipika is better. If you need ultra-custom BigQuery queries, Looker Studio remains relevant.
faq.a5: Yes. We use SSL/TLS encryption for all communications, store your data on SOC 2 certified servers, and comply with European GDPR. Your Google Ads data is never shared with third parties. We don't sell data. You own your information and can request deletion anytime.
faq.q6: Can I customize the displayed metrics?
faq.a6: Totally. Our templates are starting points, not cages. You can add/remove any Google Ads metric: Quality Score, Impression Share, Conv. Rate, Cost/Conv, etc. Drag-and-drop interface to reorganize your widgets. Save your custom templates and reuse them for other accounts.
faq.q7: Does Flipika work with Google Analytics and other tools?
faq.a7: Currently, Flipika focuses on Google Ads to offer the best possible experience. Google Analytics 4, Meta Ads, and LinkedIn Ads integration is on our 2026 roadmap. If you need a multi-source dashboard today, we recommend combining Flipika (for Google Ads) with another tool for other platforms.
faq.q8: How long does it take to create my first report?
faq.a8: Less than 3 minutes. Here's the process: (1) Connect your Google Ads account via OAuth (30 seconds), (2) Choose a pre-configured template (15 seconds), (3) Customize your branding and colors (2 minutes), (4) Share the link or configure auto-send (30 seconds). That's it. Most users have their first dashboard operational in under 5 minutes.
